About the RoleAt FINESSE, we pride ourselves in building the foundations of a consumer brain that ushers in the new age of fashion that is predictive, efficient, sustainable and truly diverse. As our Head of People, you will oversee growing our most precious resource - our team. FINESSE is unlike any other company in the industry - having not only some of the brightest minds in fashion and product but also engineering and machine learning. You will be growing both areas in tandem, our left brain and right brain. You will also nurture our unique FINESSE culture - a strongly meritocratic, diverse and highly efficient culture with some of the most dedicated & talented people in the industry. About YouYou have a unique radar for brilliant minds and dedication and have grown incredibly high-performing teams in a very short amount of time. You have created cultures of meritocracy and dedication as well as highly intellectual work environments. You live and breathe for scaling organizations that are undergoing hyper-growth and know how to create organizational structures that last and withstand the pressures of a rapidly expanding demand framework. Most of all, you love creating teams that truly care to innovate and strive & well as achieve to completely upend large industries.
Recommended BackgroundDeep experience in building and scaling successful and highly performant engineering, product and creative teams in hyper-growth environmentsA proven track record of innovation and leadership within people operationsA track record of identifying & cultivating an ultra-high-performance culture that is rooted in dedication, passion and funDeep experience in setting up internal hiring infrastructure including ladders, growth strategy, technical infrastructure and team resilience for hyper-growth companiesWhat You’ll Love at FINESSEBeing at the forefront of and working towards creating a culture-defining new productA close-knit, extremely passionate & world class team excited about changing the face of fashionA diverse team and culture that values inclusivity and individuality as highest priorityCompany sponsored happy hours and outingsComprehensive benefits: Medical, dental and vision insurance; 401kPaid maternity and paternity leaveSponsored weekly team lunchesUnlimited PTOOur CultureFINESSE has a dreamer & doer culture. We envision the next age of fashion & consumer and then get to work to implement it, always thinking creatively, innovatively and collaboratively to create real change. We are energetic, highly creative and hungry for change that is both revolutionizing as well as ethical.
